Reviews.Title: sony a58 : my best camera I have in the three(a57,a65)
Reviews.Author: chau minh ha
Reviews.Content: great camera for IQ,battery life ,easy to use & good price with a lot accessories,the more i use the more i like it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: jon duren
Reviews.Content: I have over $14,000.00 in camera equipment that is all Nikon including that I have umbrella lights and back drops. Nothing compares with that, however this is the closest to that quality that I have ever found in a small camera. I recommend it to any friend that cannot afford the amount of money I have spent in photography. You sill get so much for so little and I have two of these. I have one for work and one for play with my three kids. I have 38 employees and have  been in business as the owner of Duren Roofing Inc. here in South Florida for just over 15 years since I started my company from scratch, so I know quality when I see it and this camera has it and for a great price for what you get.  Enjoy it. :)
